description.p: Gemborn are beings of pure crystal possessing unique abilities, such as an innate connection to magic and a remarkable resistance to certain forms of harm. They are a race of both beauty and power, their very existence a testament to the extraordinary forces that shape the world.

All Gemborn possess an innate connection to magic. They can sense the subtle vibrations of the world around them, the flow of arcane energy through the very air. They resemble humanoid beings composed of crystalline structures, typically 6 to 7 feet tall and weighing 150-200 lbs, with a lifespan of 500-1000 years.

Gemborn are a relatively young race, still discovering their place in the world. They may be viewed with curiosity, awe, or even fear by other races. Their crystalline nature can impact their social interactions, making it difficult for some to express emotions or form deep connections, while others may be unusually sensitive to the emotions of others.
Crystal Heart: Gemborn have advantage on Constitution saving throws against being poisoned or petrified.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2.

Age. Gemborn transition to physical maturity by 20-25 years, mirroring human development in their late teens or early twenties. They view themselves as still being in a formative stage until they reach 50-100 years, when they feel they have gained sufficient experience and control over their abilities.
Size. Gemborn range from under 6 to over 7 feet tall. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. Gemborn can navigate dark caverns due to their crystalline forms adapting to darkness.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Crystallian.

Subrace. Gemborn are born from the heart stone, with each gem shaping their attributes: Amethyst (psychic), Diamond (strong), Emerald (natural), Sapphire (serene), Ruby (fiery), and Rose Quartz (compassionate).
Gemborn are born from the power of the heart stone, giving life to the gems and bringing their attributes to the fore. Each gem, with its unique magical properties, shapes the Gemborn that emerges.
Clad in crystalline armor, their form is a testament to strength and resilience. They exude an aura of authority and command, their presence inspiring both awe and respect.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2 and Constitution by 1.
Armour Class. Your AC score increases by 3.
Cantrip. You know the spells Frostbite and Toll the Dead.
Extra Language. You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
Adamantine Resilience. Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons.
Inner Light. 1/long rest, emit bright light in a 15-foot radius for 1 minute, granting allies advantage on sight-based Perception checks.
Flawless Focus. Advantage on Concentration saving throws.
Diamond Aura. As a reaction when hit, the Gemborn can force the attacker to make a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 force damage.
Shattering Strike. Once per short or long rest, the Gemborn can deal an extra 1d6 force damage with a melee weapon attack.
You have proficiency with Martial Weapons (Swords) and Martial Weapons (Hammers).
You know Frost Bite
You know Toll the Dead
You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
A being of ethereal amethyst, their skin shimmering with an otherworldly glow. They move through the world with a sense of detached observation, perceiving patterns and connections unseen by others.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 2 and Wisdom by 1.
Armour Class. Your AC score increases by 2.
Cantrip. You know the spells Mage Hand and Dancing Lights.
Extra Language. You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
Psychic Sensitivity. Advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks and saves against charm/frighten.
Dream Weaver. 1/long rest, trance for vision of future or distant location. Phasewalk: 1/long rest, ethereal state, immune to non magical weapons for 1 round.
Mind Shield. Gemborn have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened once per short or long rest.
Arcane Intuition. Advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks to recall magic info.
With skin the color of fresh spring leaves, they embody the life force of nature. They possess a deep connection to the natural world, understanding its rhythms and secrets.
Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom score increases by 2 and Constitution by 1.
Armour Class. Your AC score increases by 1.
Cantrip. You know the spells Acid Splash and Thorn Whip.
Extra Language. You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
Nature's Whisperer. Can cast "Speak with Plants" and "Druidcraft" each 1/long rest without using a spell slot.
Emerald Touch. The Gemborn can expend a hit die to heal a creature for a number of hit points equal to the number rolled on the die.
Forest Affinity. Advantage on saves against poison and resistance to poison damage.
Renewing Touch. Can expend a hit die to heal a plant or accelerate its growth.
One With Nature. Can attempt to hide even when only lightly obscured by natural Flora.
Their skin shimmers with the deep hues of the ocean, reflecting their calm and collected demeanor. They are skilled at reading others, their words a soothing balm in times of conflict.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2 and Intelligence by 1.
Armour Class. Your AC score increases by 2.
Cantrip. You know the spells Minor Illusion and Prestidigitation.
Extra Language. You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
Ocean's Embrace. Can hold breath twice as long and has a swimming speed of 30 feet.
Voice of Calm. Can expend a hit die to cast "Calm Emotions."
Telepathic Communication. Can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet.
Serene Mind. Advantage on saves against being charmed or frightened.
Flowing Motion. Can move through the space of larger creatures.
A fiery spirit burns within them, their skin reflecting the fiery depths of a molten core. They are impulsive and passionate, their courage inspires those around them.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2 and Strength by 1.
Armour Class. Your AC score increases by 2.
Cantrip. You know the spells Fire Bolt and Resistance.
Extra Language. You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
Burning Heart. Resistance to fire damage.
Ruby Flare. Can expend a hit die to cast "Burning Hands."
Imposing Presence. Advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) checks.
Relentless Endurance. Can drop to 1 hit point instead of 0 once per long rest.
Fueled by Fury. Deals extra fire damage with melee attacks while raging.
Their skin glows with a soft, gentle light, radiating warmth and compassion. They possess a natural empathy, feeling the joys and sorrows of others deeply.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2 and Wisdom by 1.
Armour Class. Your AC score increases by 1.
Cantrip. You know the spells Mending and Light.
Extra Language. You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
Empathic Sense. Advantage on Persuasion and Insight checks to discern emotions.
Soothing Presence. Can expend a hit die to cast "Sanctuary."
Aura of Tranquility. Advantage on saves against charm/frighten, and nearby allies gain the same advantage.
Healing Hands. Gets the Healing Hands feat.
Beacon of Hope. The Gemborn can expend a hit die to grant temporary hit points to themselves and each creature within 5 feet of them equal to the number rolled on the die.
